name: 纸人：第一章（Paper Dolls Original）
description:
Once again, Yang Ming-Yuan is awoken by his nightmare. Every time he closes his eyes, he sees horrible illusion of evil paper dolls attacking him. He is confused, terrified, sleepless and disorganized, and haunted by imaginary sounds. At the dawn, Yang Ming-Yuan decided to send his daughter to his mother.
Driving on the familiar road always makes him sad.

“If it’s not for my depression, our relationship might not end like this. What’s the meaning of my life?”

Yang Ming-Yuan was caught by these thoughts so deeply, he can’t even hear his daughter’s voices. Those imaginary sounds grow stronger. Suddenly, a sound of great impact...

“Where am I?”

When Yang Ming-Yuan wakes up, he finds himself in a deserted ancient mansion of Chinese style. Everything here seems strange, yet familiar. Is this a dream? Or am I really dead? Yang Ming-Yuan wonders...

From far away, the faint calling of his daughter comes to his ear. He struggles to put himself together and stand up, follow his daughter’s voices to the inner realm of the gloomy ancient mansion. Behind all the mysteries he will meet, a story buried for a hundred years is about to be revealed...



Unique vibe of eastern culture, realistic graphic details, and well-created sound tracks which conbines folk music, rock and vocal will bring the vivid image of this terrifying ancient great mansion before you.

Explore
Searching for your daughter in a gloomy Chinese mansion of Qing dynasty, experience this terrifying journey of thrill and confusion.

Mysteries
Resolve the traps in the ancient mansion and discover the truth of the story, unlock the doors of mysteries one by one.

Collect
Find all the pieces of messages and information, know the horrible truth of this hundred years old mansion.

Survive
The mysterious and evil paper dolls chase you everywhere. You must follow the story, hide from them and find a way to seal them, eventually reveal the shadows behind all these evil.



A first-person horror adventure game. Players must explore the gloomy ancient mansion and discover the unknown secrets behind the story.
